data.name: rooom
data.description:
The award-winning VR platform lets you create engaging environments for virtual showcases. 
Using rooom, the experience of discovering VR spaces will become even more engaging! Create unique virtual venues for digital live performances, interactive exhibitions, smart learning projects and vivid product presentations. Use our best practice templates or design your own digital experience world – there are no limits!
With rooom you are not restricted by a web browser anymore. Supported by the rooom database and API, you can enjoy your virtual spaces in high-resolution VR quality.
Immerse yourself into virtual brand worlds, walk through vibrant exhibition halls and marvel at high-resolution artworks and 3D models. Interact with the environment, discover integrated content, and meet other guests using your avatar.
rooom makes it even possible to present your virtual showcases offline – an internet connection is not necessary for the virtual experience.
